public interface CheckMethods

    Method
    Description
    SimpleAddressOwner
    getAddressOwner()
     
    Currency
    getDefaultTargetReservingCurrencyForTransfer(Claim targetClaim)
    Defines the default Reserving Currency to be used while matching Reserve Lines on this payment to those on the target Claim.

  • Method Details

    • getAddressOwner

      SimpleAddressOwner getAddressOwner()

    • getDefaultTargetReservingCurrencyForTransfer

      Currency getDefaultTargetReservingCurrencyForTransfer(Claim targetClaim)
      Defines the default Reserving Currency to be used while matching Reserve Lines on this payment to those on the target Claim. NOTE: This API is not intended to be used/extended if Multi Currency Reserving isn't enabled.
      Parameters:
      targetClaim - the claim to which this check is being transferred to.
      Returns:
      the default Target Reserving Currency. Can be null.
